parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the domain name group. If you do not specify this parameter, all domain names are queried by default.

parameters.name: KeyWord
parameters.description: The keyword for searches in "%KeyWord%" mode. The value is not case-sensitive.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **100**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SearchMode
parameters.description:
The search mode. Valid values:

*   **LIKE**: fuzzy match.
*   **EXACT**: exact match.

parameters.name: Starmark
parameters.description: Specifies whether to query the starmark of the domain name.
